channel.title: Chat Logs and Pm Logs
channel.description:
Is there a guide on how to create chat logs or pm logs on mopar? I've tried searching everywhere and I can't seem to find one anywhere, if you could please send me a link or tell me how to do it, would help a lot.
Thanks, ~Tom

item.title: Chat Logs and Pm Logs
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Take a look at Talking packets and Private Messaging packets. Then go take a look at how things are saved via text file. All you have to do is when someone pm’s or chats it will append to the text file (similar to .txt saving in 317 sources).

Read full topic
